<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's TSA/shop type of site with SEO ready 
</h1>

Start your Gatsby TSA/shop project with all SEO implementation already configured. Edit the `gatsby-config.js` and `src/components/seo.js` files for your SEO specific needs.

## SEO tips

When using `target="_blank"`, don't forget to append `rel="noopener"`.

When using affiliate links, don't forget to append `rel=sponsored`.

More info at <a href="https://webdevdocs.now.sh/seo" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://webdevdocs.now.sh/seo</a>
